The natural progression of benefits [an1: An ethical person has no regrets
Joy springs up when you have no regrets
Your body becomes tranquil when your mind is full of rapture
You feel bliss when your body is tranquil
The mind is immersed in samādhi when you feel bliss
You truly know and see when your mind is immersed in samādhi
You become disillusioned and dispassionate when you truly know and see
You realize the knowledge and vision of freedom when you’re disillusioned and dispassionate
The purpose and benefit of each stage (a: The purpose and benefit of not having regrets is skillful ethics
The purpose and benefit of joy is not having regrets
The purpose and benefit of rapture is joy
The purpose and benefit of tranquility is rapture
The purpose and benefit of bliss is tranquility
The purpose and benefit of immersion is bliss
The purpose and benefit of truly knowing and seeing is immersion
The purpose and benefit of disillusionment and dispassion is truly knowing and seeing
The purpose and benefit of the knowledge and vision of freedom is disillusionment and dispassion.
